tweet: Will be appearing on the Xtra Factor next week. Can anyone find me a pineapple?
Back from the gym. The mind gym. Or library, as some call it.
Bumped into Michael Fish in the Television Centre canteen. He asked me for a Starter For 10. I recommended the wings.
Thoroughly outraged by the content of this sandwich. Someone will be getting a shoeing.
Newsnight Review tonight. Will be talking Twitter and trying not to rhyme it with shitter.
